attributes.action: increase the amount of time within the national school cirriculum to a minimum of 6 hours per week for all students in compulsory education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the government really wants to tackle obesity they must look to stop it at the roots, within schools so i propose that they make it compulsory for all schools to have a minimum of 6 hours a week of physical education within their cirriculum and not 6 hours within a combination of cirricular and extra-cirricular.
